tags: i'm not russian if the swearing is off please let me know
title: Fictober day 10
body:
Killing Eve, gen, missing scene. Cw for profanity (English and Russian) and also for imagined murder/violent imagery (this is from Villanelle’s pov. She’s gonna think about murder.)



“You think this troubles me?” Villanelle asks boredly, eyeing Irina as they walk along the tree-lined country road. “Death threats?”

“I think you have to go to sleep at some point,” the girl spits back. “And then I’ll kill you. Suka.” God, she’s such a tiresome little brat. How has Konstantin not murdered her already? How has no one murdered her, actually? Not even a little?

“I will tie you up with an extension cord while I sleep.” Villanelle looks at her again, speculative. “You’re not too fat. Maybe could use a couple of belts. We’ll see what’s on hand.”

Irina glares. Villanelle fantasizes about very slowly, very gently using a dessert spoon to scoop her eyeballs out.

“I’m tired.”

“Be quiet or I’ll shoot you in the face.”

“I said I’m tired! Why are we just walking, stupid lady?”

“Because we do not have a car, stupid little girl. So either you walk or I shoot you. In the face.”

But instead, Irina plops down with a huff, knees sprawling as her butt hits the pavement. “So get a car. I’m not walking more.”

Seriously? Who knew kidnapping a kid would be such a fucking chore compared to murdering people? “What part of ‘shoot you in the face’ do you not understand?”

“You won’t. You need me alive, to get my father to come to you.”

“I don’t know, I didn’t plan for you being so annoying. I might update my strategy.”

“Poshla na hui, blyad.”

“Does your father know you have such a filthy mouth?” Villanelle gapes, faux-scandalized.

“Who do you think taught me?” Irina retorts. Huh, that’s a surprise. Villanelle makes a note to ask Konstantin while killing him.

“Whatever. Just shut up, you’re annoying. And don’t worry, I will find a way to kill your father, with or without you.”

There’s a silence. Thank God. Villanelle looks along the road. It’s an absurd distance to walk. But she’s not going to tell the brat that she was right.

“How are you going to kill him?” Irina suddenly asks, oddly interested. “Shooting?”

“Maybe.”

“You don’t know? I thought you had plan.”

“I do, but sometimes you need to…adapt.”

“Oh,” Irina says, sounding distinctly disappointed. What a weird kid. “I thought you knew what you’re doing.”

“I do.”

“You are stranded on a country road with little girl, you don’t seem like you know what you’re doing.”

“Well, if you’re such an expert, you tell me how to kill someone.”

Irina makes a thoughtful noise. “Shooting is good. Or maybe stabbing. But not poison. That’s for pussies.”

Villanelle looks at her again, newly appraising. Maybe this kid has some potential, after all. Villanelle still wants to scoop out her eyeballs with a dessert spoon, though.

“Keep thinking. If you come up with a good plan, I’ll buy you ice cream later. Now get up. Start walking.”

Grumbling, Irina rises. Villanelle senses that she’s in for another tantrum soon.

Oh, scooping out her eyeballs will be such fun.

blog.name: dailyvillanelle
blog.title: don’t be pathetic.
blog.description: Welcome to dailyvillanelle! Your #1 source for all things Oksana Astankova (Villanelle) from the BBC America series Killing Eve and the actress who plays her, Jodie Comer. Tracked tags: #dailyvillanelle & #villanelleedit.

tags: a better answer than the first one today
summary: What in your heavily detailed opinion, do you think season two will look like?
question: What in your heavily detailed opinion, do you think season two will look like?
answer:
Hopefully it will have easier lighting to edit. I love the show but making gifs is hard.

*Spoilers*
As for an actual answer I think from bts stuff posted on twitter s2 will start not long after s1 ended (no time jump) with V still wounded and in pjs and crocs. I think this will add hilarity to her petulant childish side but be even more unnerving and horrifying should she be on a murderous rampage.

As for the whole season I hope we find out more about The Twelve and Carolyn’s possible involvement. I really hope Elena and Kenny don’t die. I’m especially worried about Elena with Kirby getting more work in the US, which is great for her professionally, but might mean she’s less available for filming KE. 

I also can’t wait to find out how Eve is coping with the aftermath of 1x08. I’m fascinated by her curiousity and just how far she’ll go into the darkness to satisfy it.

summary: where can i watch killing eve?
question: where can i watch killing eve?
answer: All I know for sure is that it’s on the BBC iPlayer streaming service which is where I watched it - that’s in the UK, and I guess it’d be on BBC America too. Other than that I guess you’d have to search for torrents etc. Sorry if this isn’t very helpful but seek it out because it’s very good!

reblog.comment: All I know for sure is that it’s on the BBC iPlayer streaming service which is where I watched it - that’s in the UK, and I guess it’d be on BBC America too. Other than that I guess you’d have to search for torrents etc. Sorry if this isn’t very helpful but seek it out because it’s very good!

title: KILLING EVE - S1 Ep 5 & 6
body:
Oh wow! Oh this show is just getting ever more Russian spy story isn’t it! I’m MORE THAN OKAY WITH IT. I showed up for lady assassins by way of Bryan Fuller, but what I got was lady scalphunters by way of Le Carré!!! Is this…the first great British-Russian espionage drama of the New Cold War?

Season 1, Episode 5 - ‘I Have a Thing About Bathrooms’

why is this so fucking funny, I am a’lol. Eve this is not the time for your weird morbid fascination crush! drive, woman!!

Elena: “STOP BEING A DICK EVE!!!” bless this show and its crops

omg this road moment, almost mystical

Villanelle is like “the hell”

she just blew her a kiss with a bullet, o my offing god

anyway in other news I covet the cut of Sandra Oh’s pants in this, like loose menswear fit but narrowed in more at the ankle and tailored to her height. yes.

Frank, give it a rest with the brown sauce, it’s not coming out

shut up [redacted good Tinker Tailor joke], WE’RE tired

“Happily married, not one to stray.” who is he can we adopt safe house guy into the group

The Twelve. nice, mysterious. powerful.

lol the kid agrees with me, lol

aw Kenny, Kenny that’s sweet

HOW WOULD ELENA SAY IT, wow what an incredible way to override his reticence! also: lol @ Elena

this is so fucking intoxicating, trying on the niiiiice nice clothes and perfume the MURDER CAT bought her! she killed Bill!! but she’s a smart mysterious assassin babe!!

stroking her hips in the dress!!! dang, Eve!

Villanelle: “Don’t run.”
Eve: runs
Villanelle: rolls her eyes

THEY’RE SUCH A MESS I LOVE THIS. “I want to have dinner with you!!” omg

I won’t look, I’ll just unzip your dress

she is such a good actor. Villanelle. Jodie Comer too for that matter.

yay Eve! saw through it

does telling a psychopath they’re a psychopath upset them?

lol no it does not

“I think if you went high enough you’d probably find we work for the same people.” omg, she’s her Karla.

haahhhahaha

hhhhhh

!!!!??? jESUS they’ve played this Kenny reveal SO FUCKING WELL I’M LOSING IT. shocking! hilarious!

that was the most comedic jump scare I’ve seen in ages, bravo ALL around

Frank: “I have a lot of money.”
Villanelle: “So do I.”
Frank: “I have children.”
Villanelle: “I don’t want your children.”
Frank: “What, no.”

this is such an incred little death scene

tells him, just so he knows, that she’s going to kill him nicely but then make it look much worse after the fact. JUST SO HE KNOWS.

oh hey safe house guy maybe lives! a win

I am…really enjoying how Eve and *us* keep expecting/ewanting to make part of Villanelle’s…thing…a result of her being assaulted, hence the castration, when it’s reeaally starting to seem instead that she just enjoys lopping dicks off. she’s just a Hannibal isn’t she — nothing happened to me, I happened.

c’mon Eve, what would Elena say. there ya go.

oMG

Villanelle’s sausage cooking get-up is so choice. this entire scene is SO CHOICE.

oh your girl’s gettin bold! I mean more so.

Season 1, Episode 6 - ‘Take Me To the Hole!’

wow a title

yeah no shit that’s [booms] “RUSSIA”

“I swear in my heart.” oh no, now I’m starting to get worried something’s gonna happen to my other good bossman

she LICK him, GO D this girl!

love that Russian prisons give you a kerchief for your hair as if you’re an inmate and also a peasant

Niko: “Yo!”
Eve: “[laughing] Okay.”

good fight, that was intense

Carolyn Martens (slash Fionna Shaw) is the fucking bomb, I just report the facts

Carolyn: [touches down in Moscow]
Carolyn: “my time 2 shine”

pls be Konstantin pls be Konstantin

Konstantiiiiiinn :D

I love spies, I fucking love the weird open secrets and hella mannerisms and arch flirtation and constant threat of betrayal. drop Garak in here and the tone is EXACTLY the same, GOD I LOVE SPIES.

Vladimir, sincerely pleasant: “Oh trust is not necessary, Carolyn, we will record you.”

oh Konstantin must be STRESSIN

ooooo, Anna’s the reason Eve ended up in prison?? oh shit I wonder if that guy she killed…Anna….a boyfriend? a bad bad boyfriend?

did Villanelle dye her hair? it looks almost orange now

[laughing weakly] every..Soviet interior is so grim. it’s worse when they try.

lol omg they both thought it was a honey trap, WHAT A GOOD TROPE IDEA. spies plus pretend dating! guys

“agile”

wait, wait hold on, what was Elena saying back in the first eps? how Carolyn used to run a man in Russia who was the best source they ever had? Konstantin? hey listen I’m never over the way intricate decades-long spy plots unspool themselves over drinks in bleak hotels.

“Oh dear, I’m bordering on the profound.” Queen.

ding ding ding! Anna’s the wife of the dude Villanelle offed, dick in-cluded

Nadia: “Nyet!”
Villanelle: “Uhh, yes.”

well this….at least approaches atmospheric

Eve: “I just want the girls.”
Vladimir: “Why.”
literally Eve: “Because one of them is a little prick and she’s keeping me up at night.”

LITERALLY VILLANELLE: “[leans in intently] Was it an Asian woman with amazing hair?”

as far as titular lines go I could not be more satisfied with how this one was belted out

whoa wait how deep does this go?!

omg wait did Konstantin betray Villanelle??? no he’s my other maybe good boy!!

A LOT OF SHIT IS HAPPENING BASICALLY!

T B C

[ Previously, previouslier ]
body_abstract:
Oh wow! Oh this show is just getting ever more Russian spy story isn’t it! I’m MORE THAN OKAY WITH IT. I showed up for lady assassins by way of Bryan Fuller, but what I got was lady scalphunters by way of Le Carré!!! Is this…the first great British-Russian espionage drama of the New Cold War?

Season 1, Episode 5 - ‘I Have a Thing About Bathrooms’

why is this so fucking funny, I am a’lol. Eve this is not the time for your weird morbid fascination crush! drive, woman!!

Elena: “STOP BEING A DICK EVE!!!” bless this show and its crops

omg this road moment, almost mystical

Villanelle is like “the hell”

she just blew her a kiss with a bullet, o my offing god

anyway in other news I covet the cut of Sandra Oh’s pants in this, like loose menswear fit but narrowed in more at the ankle and tailored to her height. yes.

[[MORE]]

Frank, give it a rest with the brown sauce, it’s not coming out

shut up [redacted good Tinker Tailor joke], WE’RE tired

“Happily married, not one to stray.” who is he can we adopt safe house guy into the group

The Twelve. nice, mysterious. powerful.

lol the kid agrees with me, lol

aw Kenny, Kenny that’s sweet

HOW WOULD ELENA SAY IT, wow what an incredible way to override his reticence! also: lol @ Elena

this is so fucking intoxicating, trying on the niiiiice nice clothes and perfume the MURDER CAT bought her! she killed Bill!! but she’s a smart mysterious assassin babe!!

stroking her hips in the dress!!! dang, Eve!

Villanelle: “Don’t run.”
Eve: runs
Villanelle: rolls her eyes

THEY’RE SUCH A MESS I LOVE THIS. “I want to have dinner with you!!” omg

I won’t look, I’ll just unzip your dress

she is such a good actor. Villanelle. Jodie Comer too for that matter.

yay Eve! saw through it

does telling a psychopath they’re a psychopath upset them?

lol no it does not

“I think if you went high enough you’d probably find we work for the same people.” omg, she’s her Karla.

haahhhahaha

hhhhhh

!!!!??? jESUS they’ve played this Kenny reveal SO FUCKING WELL I’M LOSING IT. shocking! hilarious!

that was the most comedic jump scare I’ve seen in ages, bravo ALL around

Frank: “I have a lot of money.”
Villanelle: “So do I.”
Frank: “I have children.”
Villanelle: “I don’t want your children.”
Frank: “What, no.”

this is such an incred little death scene

tells him, just so he knows, that she’s going to kill him nicely but then make it look much worse after the fact. JUST SO HE KNOWS.

oh hey safe house guy maybe lives! a win

I am…really enjoying how Eve and *us* keep expecting/ewanting to make part of Villanelle’s…thing…a result of her being assaulted, hence the castration, when it’s reeaally starting to seem instead that she just enjoys lopping dicks off. she’s just a Hannibal isn’t she — nothing happened to me, I happened.

c’mon Eve, what would Elena say. there ya go.

oMG

Villanelle’s sausage cooking get-up is so choice. this entire scene is SO CHOICE.

oh your girl’s gettin bold! I mean more so.

Season 1, Episode 6 - ‘Take Me To the Hole!’

wow a title

yeah no shit that’s [booms] “RUSSIA”

she LICK him, GO D this girl!

love that Russian prisons give you a kerchief for your hair as if you’re an inmate and also a peasant

Eve: “[laughing] Okay.”

pls be Konstantin pls be Konstantin

oh Konstantin must be STRESSIN

ooooo, Anna’s the reason Eve ended up in prison?? oh shit I wonder if that guy she killed…Anna….a boyfriend? a bad bad boyfriend?

[laughing weakly] every..Soviet interior is so grim. it’s worse when they try.
